subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Keyboard mappings and keyboard layouts
msgSnippet: I like the colors! It s helpful. On another note, I see that you re thinking about new names for the letters, and some of these are quite good. One thing that
messageBody:
I like the colors! It's helpful.

On another note, I see that you're thinking about new names for the
letters, and some of these are quite good. One thing that I don't like
about the revised names is that they include several male names, but
no female names. It would be nice to rectify that... perhaps 'Moira'
for #22!

One problem with the English names for letters in the Roman alphabet
is that many of them rhyme, so we end up on the phone saying "B as in
Bravo, D as in Delta", or whatever. When considering new letter names,
I think it's good to come up with names that are easily recognized
over a noisy connection.

Ted
